author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Transport Fever 3 cinematic announcement trailer for the upcoming game in the transportation sim and city-building series. Transport Fever 3 will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X|S in 2026.

Transport Fever 3 challenges players to design, build, and manage transport empires spanning railways, roads, shipping lanes, and air routes across 4 distinctive environments: temperate, desert, tropical, and new sub-arctic. Each of which offers a unique set of challenges and gameplay possibilities thanks to massively upgraded terrain generation. Players build their worlds using vehicles covering a century of transport innovation with over 250 authentic trains, buses, trams, trucks, trains, ships, planes, and, for the first time, helicopters.
title: Transport Fever 3 - Official Cinematic Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
title: Will Stitch be in Avengers: Doomsday? Here's what Stitch had to say... #stitch #avengers #ign

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Teaser Trailer for Chief of War, an upcoming historical drama epic distributed by Apple TV Plus.

Set amidst the beautiful backdrop of the islands of Hawai‘i, the nine-episode series, based on true events, follows warrior Ka’iana, as he tries to unify the islands before Western colonization in the late 18th century.

Chief of War stars Jason Momoa, Luciane Buchanan, Temuera Morrison, Te Ao o Hinepehinga, Cliff Curtis, newcomer Kaina Makua, Moses Goods, Siua Ikale’o, Brandon Finn, James Udom, Mainei Kinimaka,Te Kohe Tuhaka, and Benjamin Hoetjes. 

“Chief of War" is produced for Apple TV+ by FIFTH SEASON and Chernin Entertainment. Momoa directs the season finale and serves as executive producer. Doug Jung serves as showrunner and executive produces along with Sibbett, Peter Chernin, Jenno Topping, Tracey Cook and Brian Mendoza. Justin Chon directs the first two episodes and serves as executive producer. Anders Engstrom, Jim Rowe, Molly Allen, Francis Lawrence and Tim
title: Chief of War - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Jason Momoa

author: IGN
description:
Sometimes the fastest route is a straight line..and in this case its through someones house. In Deliver at all Costs you play as Winston, a down on his luck former engineer who takes up a job as a delivery guy in a 1960's era america where roads are just a suggestion. 
Check out our review here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nXD0aQzRZA0
Gameplay captured on PC with the highest graphics settings selected.
title: Driving Through a Bunch of Buildings In Deliver At All Costs | The First 28 Minutes of 4K Gameplay

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Season 4 Launch Trailer for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 & Warzone, the latest addition to the first-person action shooter series developed by Treyarch. Season 4 is packed with new content from new maps, weapons, and more for players to enjoy. Season 4 of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 & Warzone launches on May 29.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 & Warzone - Official Season 4 Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Welcome to the Swordsmith Village. Watch the latest Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 trailer for this upcoming action game to get a peek into the Swordsmith Village Arc. Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 will be available on PC, PS4 (PlayStation 4), PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch on August 5, 2025.
title: Demon Slayer -Kimetsu no Yaiba- The Hinokami Chronicles 2 - Official Swordsmith Village Arc Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Legacy Series Part 4 for Metal Gear Solid, a look back at iconic tactical espionage series developed by Konami. With the imminent arrival of Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, join David Hayter, the voice of Naked Snake, and Lori Alan, the voice of The Boss, as they watch the remastered intro cutscene for Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater. Afterwards, the cast tries some interesting meals inspired by the legendary game series. Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater is launching on August 28 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: Metal Gear Solid - Official Legacy Series Part 4 (ft. David Hayter)

author: IGN
description:
Of all the reasons to watch the Mission: Impossible movies, more than the exotic locales or high-tech macguffins, watching Tom Cruise risk life and limb doing progressively crazier and more death-defying stunts has to be number one. After 8 films in the franchise across 4 decades, there’s really not even a second place. But it’s easy to forget the relatively humble beginnings of Ethan Hunt’s big screen adventures as not-quite-an-action-star Tom Cruise gradually became more determined to single-handedly change the course of cinematic spectacle. So here, for the next 100 minutes or so, let’s take some time to study the 30-year evolution of the Impossible stunts Tom Cruise and a legion of filmmakers, riggers and practical effects wizards brought to life for the Mission: Impossible franchise.

From the iconic vault heist to steal the NOC list from CIA Headquarters in Langley, through John Woo's signature white doves and slow motion, JJ Abrams nuts and bolts approach to action sequences an
title: The 30-Year Evolution of Mission: Impossible Stunts

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Gameplay Reveal Trailer for Mukti, a first-person narrative-driven thriller developed by underDOGS Studio as part of Sony's India Hero Project. Players will embody the role of Arya, a young woman searching for her grandfather in a sprawling museum owned by him in mid-2000s India. Players will uncover dark truths pertaining to human trafficking and the ultimate mystery of Arya's grandfather's disappearance. Mukti is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5) and PC (Steam).

#Mukti #Gaming #IGN
title: Mukti - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Elden Ring Nightreign game and combat designer Takuya Miyazawa tells us about how the team aimed to speed up the action in the upcoming three-player soulslike roguelike.

#IGN #Gaming #EldenRingNightreign
title: How Elden Ring Nightreign's Combat Designer Aimed to Speed Up the Action – IGN First

author: IGN
description: Check out this Displacement cinematic trailer for this upcoming dark, first-person survival horror with intense combat, a unique temperature system, and a chilling story of madness set in a polar research station. Displacement will be available on PC and consoles. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2824520/Displacement/
title: Displacement - Official Cinematic Trailer

author: IGN
description: Introducing Castle of Heart: Retold, a completely reworked version of the challenging action platformer that had been exclusive to the Nintendo Switch. The tweaks include rewritten dialog, reworked cutscenes, remixed music, graphics and animation changes, improved gameplay and UI, changed endings, and more. Castle of Heart: Retold will be available on Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC in Q2 2025.
title: Castle of Heart: Retold – Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Lies of P: Overture doesn’t play with the Pinocchio-inspired soulslike's formula too much, but in our hands-on we found that the new ingredients it added, like the great new weapon types and fabulously freaky monsters, proved that there's never really too much of a good thing, even if it is largely the same thing. Previewed by Jarrett Green'

#IGN #Gaming #LiesOfP
title: Lies of P: Overture Wears its Bloodborne Inspiration Proudly on its Sleeve

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for Caught Stealing, a crime thriller film distributed by Columbia Pictures. 

Hank Thompson was a high-school baseball phenom who can’t play anymore, but everything else is going okay. He’s got a great girl, tends bar at a New York dive, and his favorite team is making an underdog run at the pennant.

When his punk-rock neighbor Russ asks him to take care of his cat for a few days, Hank suddenly finds himself caught in the middle of a motley crew of threatening gangsters. They all want a piece of him; the problem is he has no idea why. As Hank attempts to evade their ever-tightening grip, he’s got to use all his hustle to stay alive long enough to find out…

Caught Stealing stars Austin Butler, Zoë Kravitz, Matt Smith, Regina King, Liev Schreiber, Vincent D’Onofrio, Griffin Dunne, Benito A Martínez Ocasio (Bad Bunny), and Carol Kane. The film is directed by Darren Aronofsky, with a screenplay by Charlie Huston, based on his book of the same name. 

Caught S
title: Caught Stealing - Official Trailer (2025) Austin Butler, Zoë Kravitz, Benito "Bad Bunny" Ocasio

author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Mandalorian Rising' Galactic Battle Gameplay Trailer for Fortnite, the hit third-person battle royale game developed by Epic Games. Players can soon suit up as a Mandalorian to join the fight. Recruit Heavy, Scout, Supply, or Medic Mandalorian to your team, and gain further advantage over your opponents with the unvaulted Mandalorian Jetpack alongside the Amban Sniper Rifle and the new dual-wield WESTAR-34 Blaster Pistols. Mandalorian Uprising launches into Fortnite on May 22.

#Fortnite #Mandalorians #StarWars
title: Fortnite - Official 'Mandalorian Rising' Galactic Battle Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Celebrate the Early Access launch of new city-building strategy game City Tales: Medieval Era with this new trailer. City Tales will evolve over the course of Early Access, but it ships out of the gate with two game modes, 50+ buildings, 40+ resources and a deep economy system, and nine companions to build your settlements. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3265070/City_Tales__Medieval_Era/

#IGN #Gaming
title: City Tales: Medieval Era – Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the PS5 Announcement Trailer for Senua’s Saga: Hellblade 2, an action-adventure game developed by Ninja Theory. Players will embark on a new adventure as Senua to survive through the myth and torment of Viking Iceland, save those from the horrors of tyranny, and overcome the darkness within. The game is coming to PlayStation 5 (PS5) in Summer 2025 with new features that will become available on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox PC, and PC (Steam). Senua’s Saga: Hellblade 2 is launching on PlayStation 5 (PS5) with PlayStation 5 Pro optimizations in Summer 2025 alongside the game being available now for Xbox Series X|S, Xbox PC, and PC (Steam).

#Hellblade2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Senua’s Saga: Hellblade 2 - Official PS5 Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Here's your look at Critical Shift in this announcement trailer for the upcoming turn-based tactical thriller game with survival elements. The Critical Shift trailer shows turn-based combat gameplay, gives a peek into the story, and more. In Critical Shift, explore a secret research facility buried beneath the ice and uncover the dangers lurking within. Command a team of elite agents, equip them for the mission, and combine their unique abilities to adapt to ever-changing threats. Critical Shift will be available on PC via Steam, Xbox, and PlayStation in 2025.
title: Critical Shift - Official Announcement Trailer

title: We asked Stitch about the 2002 Lilo & Stitch trailer with Aladdin & Jasmine... #stitch #movie #ign

author: IGN
description:
Blades of Fire reviewed by Jada Griffin on PlayStation 5, also available on Xbox Series X|S and PC.

Blades of Fire’s blacksmithing burns bright, but it doesn’t forge a sharp enough edge to put its customizable weapons to good use. The combat is serviceable but overly simplistic, and the mediocre story often failed to evoke any kind of emotion in me at all, positive or negative, as it just goes through the motions from start to finish. The unintuitive map also frequently left me running in circles, making what could have been a fun hunt for worthwhile secrets feel more like a chore. And when those pain points are compounded by unflattering comparisons to the games it so clearly took inspiration from, Blades of Fire just can’t cut it.
title: Blades of Fire Review
